applicability.1: Applies to all citizens of India regardless of religion
applicability.2: Inter-religious marriages, civil marriages without religious ceremonies
applicability.3: Indians living abroad can marry under this Act

marriage_conditions.4: Conditions - Age 21 for male, 18 for female, monogamy, sound mind, not within prohibited degrees
marriage_conditions.5: Notice of intended marriage - 30 days notice to Marriage Officer
marriage_conditions.6: Objections to marriage - Any person can object within 30 days
marriage_conditions.7: Marriage solemnization - Before Marriage Officer with 3 witnesses

divorce_grounds.27: Divorce grounds - Adultery, cruelty, desertion for 2 years, mental disorder, venereal disease, renunciation, not heard alive for 7 years, no cohabitation for 1 year after judicial separation, no resumption after restitution decree
divorce_grounds.28: Divorce by mutual consent - After 1 year of marriage, 6-18 months waiting period

maintenance.36: Alimony pendente lite - Interim maintenance during proceedings
maintenance.37: Permanent alimony - Monthly or lump sum payment after divorce
maintenance.38: Custody of children - Based on child's welfare

registration.15: Marriage certificate issued immediately after solemnization
registration.16: Registration of marriages solemnized under other laws
